title: Anoka Ramsey Community College
description: Anoka-Ramsey Community College is a multi-campus institution and a member of the Minnesota State Colleges and Universities system.
cleaned_text: The following courses are available at one or both campuses of Anoka-Ramsey Community College. The courses are listed alphabetically by disciplines i.e., Chemistry, Engineering, Music, Psychology. The format of each entry is the same. Discipline and course numbers are listed first, followed by the course titles and the number of academic credits. Next, the MnTC goal areas satisfied by this course are listed, followed by any prerequisites and/or corequisites. Finally, a brief course description gives essential course features, usually ending with the number and kind of class meeting periods. On occasion, however, student or program needs may necessitate changes.
